title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Student-AI Collaborative Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students successfully complete collaborative projects using AI tools to solve real-world language problems (e.g., translation error correction, context-based vocabulary recommendations) with at least 80% success.
Learners can identify ethical issues in AI-generated content and propose at least five alternative expressions.
Teams document AI interaction experience cases and exchange at least three peer feedbacks based on a rubric.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
